comments.body:
Please add a comment above the `license_file` line that says something like:

```
# License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/thu-ml/tianshou/pull/227`
```

I opened up a PR (https://github.com/thu-ml/tianshou/pull/227) to include the license file in the source distribution. If that PR is merged or some other solution is implemented, then in future releases, this acts as a reminder to use the copy of the license file that comes in the source distribution.
Should I remove the LICENSE file in this PR?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +36,40 @@  license_family: MIT
  # License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/thu-ml/tianshou/pull/227
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Tianshou is an elegant, flexible, and superfast PyTorch deep reinforcement learning platform.
  doc_url: https://tianshou.readthedocs.io/
